definition: to push oneself forward/to seek fame/to be in the limelight/same as 出鋒頭|出锋头[chu1 feng1 tou5]

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
wind/news/style/custom/manner/CL:陣|阵[zhen4],絲|丝[si1]
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
suffix for nouns

sentences.english: Now, Bert, quit hogging the limelight.
Don't be pushy, but let everybody know you're around.
sentences.chinese: 別好出風頭，但是要讓大家知道你的存在。

sentences.english: The new girl is such a flirt.
sentences.chinese: 新來的女孩子很愛出風頭。

sentences.english: The politician is in the limelight showing off.
sentences.chinese: 這位政客是個在衆人面前愛出風頭的人。

sentences.english: The Kingdom pursued a very forward policy.
sentences.chinese: 這個王國奉行一種好出風頭的政策。

sentences.english: Her behavior has become exhibitionist and totally out of character.
sentences.chinese: 她的行爲變成愛出風頭，跟她正常的性格大不相同。

sentences.english: It may seem a little pushy but it is a perfectly fair thing to ask.
sentences.chinese: 這似乎有點愛出風頭，但是也是值得去問的。

sentences.english: There's a considerable number of people who like him, round in society; they're very fash able just now.
sentences.chinese: 在社交界有不少人喜歡他，這些人現在都很出風頭。

sentences.english: Somebody likeks to show off in public.
sentences.chinese: 有人就喜歡在公共場合出風頭。

sentences.english: Yes, she is a role model, but largely for tiresome narcissists and exhibitionists. Nor do I think she was much of an actress.
sentences.chinese: 她那無聊的自戀和愛出風頭的確稱得上典型角色。

sentences.english: Probably not the smoothest move on the first day , right?
sentences.chinese: 第一天就出風頭不太好，是吧？

sentences.english: His constant taking center stage could deprive him of his privacy.
sentences.chinese: 他好出風頭之毛病讓他毫無隱私可言。

sentences.english: Ecologically-friendly cars grab limelight at tokyo auto show thanks to soaring oil prices.
sentences.chinese: 油價高起，生態汽車在東京車展上大出風頭。

definition: to nod one's head and bow (idiom); bowing and scraping/unctuous fawning
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
honorable even in defeat (idiom)
bossy and domineering/throwing one's weight about
product placement
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to withdraw/to hole up
crafty plots and machinations (idiom)
to boss people around (idiom)
impoverished/backward both economically and culturally
(idiom) to freely air one's views/to be heard far and wide/to attract a lot of attention
to display one's slight skill before an expert (idiom)
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
stupid/stubborn/pigheaded
reckless/extremely daring
